Hi guys, have a question related to routing.
I have one base partial which includes header, and, i use it in all my pages and blog pages.
But the question is, I don`t know how to implement classic behavior for header logo. If i will make default reference to index page,
```<a href="/"></a>```
It will lead to different domains from page and blog pages (<http://blog.company.com|blog.company.com> and to <http://company.com|company.com>).
The problem that I don`t want to paste there absolute path, because of testing purposes.
Appreciate for your help.
If you use a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#link|link field> you can choose a page to link to. That way it'll always link to the page
